lime noun
(CHEMICAL)
[ U ] (also quicklime) a white substance that is used especially to spread on the land to improve the quality of earth so that crops grow better
RHJ/iStock/Getty Images Plus/Getty Images /GettyImages
[ U ] (also limescale, scale) white material that collects inside water pipes, kettles, etc. in areas where the water is hard (= contains a lot of natural chemicals)
